sense.gloss: preparation, arrangements, getting ready, provision, setup, reserving
putting in place, development, improvement, preparation, provision, equipping, outfitting
equipment, facilities, installation, accommodations, conveniences, arrangements
preparatory school (for entrance examinations), cram school, cramming school
to furnish with, to equip with, to provide, to install
to prepare for, to make preparations for, to make provision for
to possess (all that is needed), to be endowed with, to be equipped with
to be born with, to have since birth
stockpile, reserves, storing, stocking up, laying in (supplies)
being fully equipped, being fully furnished
Bizen (former province located in the southeast of present-day Okayama Prefecture)

r_ele.r: スプリンクラーせつび

sense.gloss: sweet dumpling made with mochi flour and (sometimes) millet flour (famous product of Okayama)

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑準備↑↓じゅんび↓なしに↑受験↑↓じゅけん↓するなんて↑馬鹿↑↓ばか↓なことをすべきでなかったね。
sdata.e: You should have known better than to take an examination without preparing for it.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑試験↑↓しけん↓の↑準備↑↓じゅんび↓をしたほうがよい。

sdata.e: You should advocate disarmament.
